items.name: Armor-Piercing Rounds
items.description: Deal an additional 20% damage (+20% per stack) to bosses.

items.name: Backup Magazine
items.description: Add +1 (+1 per stack) charge of your Secondary skill.

items.name: Bundle of Fireworks
items.description: Activating an interactable launches 8 (+4 per stack) fireworks that deal 300% base damage.

items.name: Bustling Fungus
items.description: After standing still for 2 seconds, create a zone that heals for 4.5% (+2.25% per stack) of your health every second to all allies within 3m (+1.5m per stack).

items.name: Cautious Slug
items.description: Increases base health regeneration by +4 hp/s (+4 hp/s per stack) while outside of combat.

items.name: Crowbar
items.description: Deal 150% (+50% per stack) damage to enemies above 90% health.

items.name: Energy Drink
items.description: Sprint speed is improved by 30% (+20% per stack).

items.name: Focus Crystal
items.description: Increase damage to enemies within 13m by 15% (+15% per stack).

items.name: Fresh Meat
items.description: Increases base health regeneration by +2 hp/s for 3s (+3s per stack) after killing an enemy.

items.name: Gasoline
items.description: Killing an enemy ignites all enemies within 12m (+4m per stack). Enemies burn for 150% (+75% per stack) base damage.

items.name: Item Scrap - White
items.description: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.

items.name: Lens-Maker's Glasses
items.description: Your attacks have a 10% (+10% per stack) chance to 'Critically Strike', dealing double damage.

items.name: Medkit
items.description: 2 seconds after getting hurt, heal for 20 plus an additional 5% (+5% per stack) of maximum health.

items.name: Monster Tooth
items.description: Killing an enemy spawns a healing orb that heals for 8 plus an additional 2% (+2% per stack) of maximum health.

items.name: Paul's Goat Hoof
items.description: Increases movement speed by 14% (+14% per stack).

items.name: Personal Shield Generator
items.description: Gain a shield equal to 8% (+8% per stack) of your maximum health. Recharges outside of danger.

items.name: Repulsion Armor Plate
items.description: Reduce all incoming damage by 5 (+5 per stack). Cannot be reduced below 1.

items.name: Rusted Key
items.description: A hidden cache containing an item will appear in a random location on each stage. (Increases rarity of the item per stack).

items.name: Soldier's Syringe
items.description: Increases attack speed by 15% (+15% per stack).

items.name: Sticky Bomb
items.description: 5% (+5% per stack) chance on hit to attach a bomb to an enemy, detonating for 180% TOTAL damage.

items.name: Stun Grenade
items.description: 5% (+5% on stack) chance on hit to stun enemies for 2 seconds.

items.name: Topaz Brooch
items.description: Gain a temporary barrier on kill for 15 health (+15 per stack).

items.name: Tougher Times
items.description: 15% (+15% per stack) chance to block incoming damage. Unaffected by luck.

items.name: Tri-Tip Dagger
items.description: 15% (+15% per stack) chance to bleed an enemy for 240% base damage.

items.name: Warbanner
items.description: On level up or starting the Teleporter event, drop a banner that strengthens all allies within 16m (+8m per stack). Raise attack and movement speed by 30%.

items.name: AtG Missile Mk. 1
items.description: 10% chance to fire a missile that deals 300% (+300% per stack) TOTAL damage.

items.name: Bandolier
items.description: 18% (+10% per stack) chance on kill to drop an ammo pack that resets all skill cooldowns.

items.name: Berzerker's Pauldron
items.description: Killing 3 enemies within 1 second sends you into a frenzy for 6s (+4s per stack). Increases movement speed by 50% and attack speed by 100%.

items.name: Chronobauble
items.description: Slow enemies on hit for -60% movement speed for 2s (+2s per stack).

items.name: Death Mark
items.description: Enemies with 4 or more debuffs are marked for death, increasing damage taken by 50% from all sources for 7 (+7 per stack) seconds.

items.name: Fuel Cell
items.description: Hold an additional equipment charge (+1 per stack). Reduce equipment cooldown by 15% (+15% per stack).

items.name: Ghor's Tome
items.description: 4% (+4% on stack) chance on kill to drop a treasure worth $25. Scales over time.

items.name: Harvester's Scythe
items.description: Gain 5% critical chance. Critical strikes heal for 8 (+4 per stack) health.

items.name: Hopoo Feather
items.description: Gain +1 (+1 per stack) maximum jump count.

items.name: Infusion
items.description: Killing an enemy increases your health permanently by 1 (+1 per stack), up to a maximum of 100 (+100 per stack) health.

items.name: Item Scrap - Green
items.description: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.

items.name: Kjaro's Band
items.description: Hits that deal more than 400% damage also blasts enemies with a runic flame tornado, dealing 300% (+300% per stack) TOTAL damage over time. Recharges every 10 seconds.

items.name: Leeching Seed
items.description: Dealing damage heals you for 1 (+1 per stack) health.

items.name: Lepton Daisy
items.description: Release a healing nova during the Teleporter event, healing all nearby allies for 50% of their maximum health. Occurs 1 (+1 per stack) times.

items.name: Old Guillotine
items.description: Instantly kill Elite monsters below 13% (+13% per stack) health.

items.name: Old War Stealthkit
items.description: Chance on taking damage to gain 40% movement speed and invisibility for 3s (+1.5s per stack). Chance increases the more damage you take.

items.name: Predatory Instincts
items.description: Gain 5% critical chance. Critical strikes increase attack speed by 12%. Maximum cap of 36% (+24% per stack) attack speed.

items.name: Razorwire
items.description: Getting hit causes you to explode in a burst of razors, dealing 160% damage. Hits up to 5 (+2 per stack) targets in a 25m (+10m per stack) radius

items.name: Red Whip
items.description: Leaving combat boosts your movement speed by 30% (+30% per stack).

items.name: Rose Buckler
items.description: Increase armor by 30 (+30 per stack) while sprinting.

items.name: Runald's Band
items.description: Hits that deal more than 400% damage also blasts enemies with a runic ice blast, slowing them by 80% for 3s (+3s per stack) and dealing 250% (+250% per stack) TOTAL damage. Recharges every 10 seconds.

items.name: Squid Polyp
items.description: Activating an interactable summons a Squid Turret that attacks nearby enemies at 100% (+100% per stack) attack speed. Lasts 30 seconds.

items.name: Ukulele
items.description: 25% chance to fire chain lightning for 80% TOTAL damage on up to 3 (+2 per stack) targets within 20m (+2m per stack).

items.name: War Horn
items.description: Activating your Equipment gives you +70% attack speed for 8s (+4s per stack).

items.name: Wax Quail
items.description: Jumping while sprinting boosts you forward by 10m (+10m per stack).

items.name: Will-o'-the-wisp
items.description: On killing an enemy, spawn a lava pillar in a 12m (+2.4m per stack) radius for 350% (+280% per stack) base damage.

items.name: 57 Leaf Clover
items.description: All random effects are rolled +1 (+1 per stack) times for a favorable outcome.

items.name: Aegis
items.description: Healing past full grants you a temporary barrier for 50% (+50% per stack) of the amount you healed.

items.name: Alien Head
items.description: Reduce skill cooldowns by 25% (+25% per stack).

items.name: Brainstalks
items.description: Upon killing an elite monster, enter a frenzy for 4s (+4s per stack) where skills have 0.5s cooldowns.

items.name: Brilliant Behemoth
items.description: All your attacks explode in a 4m (+1.5m per stack) radius for a bonus 60% TOTAL damage to nearby enemies.

items.name: Ceremonial Dagger
items.description: Killing an enemy fires out 3 homing daggers that deal 150% (+150% per stack) base damage.

items.name: Defensive Microbots
items.description: Shoot down 1 (+1 per stack) projectiles within 20m every 0.5 seconds. Recharge rate scales with attack speed.

items.name: Dio's Best Friend
items.description: Upon death, this item will be consumed and you will return to life with 3 seconds of invulnerability.

items.name: Frost Relic
items.description: Killing an enemy surrounds you with an ice storm that deals 600% damage per second. The storm grows with every kill, increasing its radius by 1m. Stacks up to 6m (+6m per stack).

items.name: H3AD-5T v2
items.description: Increase jump height. Creates a 5m-100m radius kinetic explosion on hitting the ground, dealing 1000%-10000% base damage that scales up with speed. Recharges in 10 (-50% per stack) seconds.

items.name: Happiest Mask
items.description: Killing enemies has a 7% chance to spawn a ghost of the killed enemy with 1500% damage. Lasts 30s (+30s per stack).

items.name: Hardlight Afterburner
items.description: Add +2 (+2 per stack) charges of your Utility skill. Reduces Utility skill cooldown by 33%.

items.name: Interstellar Desk Plant
items.description: On kill, plant a healing fruit seed that grows into a plant after 5 seconds. The plant heals for 10% of maximum health every second to all allies within 5m (+5.0m per stack). Lasts 10 seconds.

items.name: Item Scrap - Red
items.description: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.

items.name: N'kuhana's Opinion
items.description: Store 100% (+100% per stack) of healing as Soul Energy. After your Soul Energy reaches 10% of your maximum health, fire a skull that deals 250% of your Soul Energy as damage.

items.name: Rejuvenation Rack
items.description: Heal +100% (+100% per stack) more.

items.name: Resonance Disc
items.description: Killing enemies charges the Resonance Disc. The disc launches itself toward a target for 300% base damage (+300% per stack), piercing all enemies it doesn't kill, and then explodes for 1000% base damage (+1000% per stack). Returns to the user, striking all enemies along the way for 300% base damage (+300% per stack).

items.name: Sentient Meat Hook
items.description: 20% (+20% per stack) chance on hit to fire homing hooks at up to 10 (+5 per stack) enemies for 100% TOTAL damage.

items.name: Shattering Justice
items.description: After hitting an enemy 5 times, reduce their armor by 60 for 8 (+8 per stack) seconds.

items.name: Soulbound Catalyst
items.description: Kills reduce equipment cooldown by 4s (+2s per stack).

items.name: Unstable Tesla Coil
items.description: Fire out lightning that hits 3 (+2 per stack) enemies for 200% base damage every 0.5s. The Tesla Coil switches off every 10 seconds.

items.name: Wake of Vultures
items.description: Gain the power of any killed elite monster for 8s (+5s per stack).

items.name: Artifact Key
items.description: A stone shard with immense power.

items.name: Genesis Loop
items.description: Falling below 25% health causes you to explode, dealing 6000% base damage. Recharges every 30 / (2 +1 per stack) seconds .

items.name: Halcyon Seed
items.description: Summon Aurelionite during the teleporter event. It has 100% (+50% per stack) damage and 100% (+100% per stack) health.

items.name: Irradiant Pearl
items.description: Increases ALL stats by 10% (+10% per stack).

items.name: Item Scrap - Yellow
items.description: Does nothing. Prioritized when used with 3D Printers.

items.name: Little Disciple
items.description: Fire a tracking wisp for 300% (+300% per stack) damage. Fires every 1.6 seconds while sprinting. Fire rate increases with movement speed.

items.name: Mired Urn
items.description: While in combat, the nearest 1 (+1 per stack) characters to you within 13m will be 'tethered' to you, dealing 100% damage per second, applying tar, and healing you for 100% of the damage dealt.

items.name: Molten Perforator
items.description: 10% chance on hit to call forth 3 magma balls from an enemy, dealing 300% (+300% per stack) damage each.

items.name: Pearl
items.description: Increases maximum health by 10% (+10% per stack).

items.name: Queen's Gland
items.description: Every 30 seconds, summon a Beetle Guard with bonus 300% damage and 100% health. Can have up to 1 (+1 per stack) Guards at a time.

items.name: Shatterspleen
items.description: Gain 5% critical chance. Critical Strikes bleed enemies for 240% base damage. Bleeding enemies explode on death for 400% (+400% per stack) damage, plus an additional 15% (+15% per stack) of their maximum health.

items.name: Titanic Knurl
items.description: Increase maximum health by 40 (+40 per stack) and base health regeneration by +1.6 hp/s (+1.6 hp/s per stack).

items.name: Beads of Fealty
items.description: Seems to do nothing... but...

items.name: Brittle Crown
items.description: 30% chance on hit to gain 2 (+2 per stack) gold. Scales over time. Lose gold on taking damage equal to 100% (+100% per stack) of the maximum health percentage you lost.

items.name: Corpsebloom
items.description: Heal +100% (+100% per stack) more. All healing is applied over time. Can heal for a maximum of 10% (reduced by 50% per stack) of your health per second.

items.name: Defiant Gouge
items.description: Using a Shrine summons enemies (stronger per stack) nearby. Scales over time.

items.name: Focused Convergence
items.description: Teleporters charge 30% (+30% per stack) faster, but the size of the Teleporter zone is 50% (-50% per stack) smaller.

items.name: Gesture of the Drowned
items.description: Reduce Equipment cooldown by 50% (+15% per stack). Forces your Equipment to activate whenever it is off cooldown.

items.name: Mercurial Rachis
items.description: Creates a Ward of Power in a random location nearby that buffs both enemies and allies within 16m (+50% per stack), causing them to deal +50% damage.

items.name: Purity
items.description: All skill cooldowns are reduced by 2 (+1 per stack) seconds. All random effects are rolled +1 (+1 per stack) times for an unfavorable outcome.

items.name: Shaped Glass
items.description: Increase base damage by 100% (+100% per stack). Reduce maximum health by 50% (+50% per stack).

items.name: Strides of Heresy
items.description: Replace your Utility Skill with Shadowfade. Fade away, becoming intangible and gaining +30% movement speed. Heal for 25% (+25% per stack) of your maximum health. Lasts 3 (+3 per stack) seconds.

items.name: Transcendence
items.description: Convert all but 1 health into regenerating shields. Gain 50% (+25% per stack) maximum health.

items.name: Visions of Heresy
items.description: Replace your Primary Skill with Hungering Gaze. Fire a flurry of tracking shards that detonate after a delay, dealing 120% base damage. Hold up to 12 charges (+12 per stack) that reload after 2 seconds (+2 per stack).

items.name: Blast Shower
items.description: Cleanse all negative effects. Includes debuffs, damage over time, and nearby projectiles.

items.name: Disposable Missile Launcher
items.description: Fire a swarm of 12 missiles that deal 12x300% damage.

items.name: Eccentric Vase
items.description: Create a quantum tunnel of up to 1000m in length. Lasts 30 seconds.

items.name: Foreign Fruit
items.description: Instantly heal for 50% of your maximum health.

items.name: Forgive Me Please
items.description: Throw a cursed doll out that triggers any On-Kill effects you have every 1 second for 8 seconds.

items.name: Fuel Array
items.description: Looks like it could power something. EXTREMELY unstable...

items.name: Gnarled Woodsprite
items.description: Gain a Woodsprite follower that heals for 1.5% of your maximum health/second. Can be sent to an ally to heal them for 10% of their maximum health.

items.name: Gorag's Opus
items.description: All allies enter a frenzy for 7 seconds. Increases movement speed by 50% and attack speed by 100%.

items.name: Jade Elephant
items.description: Gain 500 armor for 5 seconds.

items.name: Milky Chrysalis
items.description: Sprout wings and fly for 15 seconds. Gain +20% movement speed for the duration.

items.name: Ocular HUD
items.description: Gain +100% Critical Strike Chance for 8 seconds.

items.name: Preon Accumulator
items.description: Fires preon tendrils, zapping enemies within 35m for up to 600% damage/second. On contact, detonate in an enormous 20m explosion for 4000% damage.

items.name: Primordial Cube
items.description: Fire a black hole that draws enemies within 30m into its center. Lasts 10 seconds

items.name: Radar Scanner
items.description: Reveal all interactables within 500m for 10 seconds.

items.name: Recycler
items.description: Transform an Item or Equipment into a different one. Can only be converted into the same tier one time.

items.name: Royal Capacitor
items.description: Call down a lightning strike on a targeted monster, dealing 3000% damage and stunning nearby monsters.

items.name: Sawmerang
items.description: Throw three large saw blades that slice through enemies for 3x400% damage. Also deals an additional 3x100% damage per second while bleeding enemies. Can strike enemies again on the way back.

items.name: Super Massive Leech
items.description: Heal for 20% of the damage you deal. Lasts 8 seconds.

items.name: The Back-up
items.description: Call 4 Strike Drones to fight for you. Lasts 25 seconds.

items.name: The Crowdfunder
items.description: Fires a continuous barrage that deals 100% damage per bullet. Costs $1 per bullet. Cost increases over time.

items.name: Volcanic Egg
items.description: Turn into a draconic fireball for 5 seconds. Deal 500% damage on impact. Detonates at the end for 800% damage.

items.name: Effigy of Grief
items.description: ALL characters within are slowed by 50% and have their armor reduced by 20. Can place up to 5.

items.name: Glowing Meteorite
items.description: Rain meteors from the sky, damaging ALL characters for 600% damage per blast. Lasts 20 seconds.

items.name: Helfire Tincture
items.description: Ignite ALL characters within 15m for 12s. Deal 5% of your maximum health/second as burning to yourself. The burn is 0.5x stronger on allies, and 24x stronger on enemies.

items.name: Spinel Tonic
items.description: Drink the Tonic, gaining a boost for 20 seconds. Increases damage by +100%. Increases attack speed by +70%. Increases armor by +20. Increases maximum health by +50%. Increases passive health regeneration by +300%. Increases movespeed by +30%. When the Tonic wears off, you have a 20% chance to gain a Tonic Affliction, reducing all of your stats by -5% (-5% per stack).
